thread.title: 'Incredibles 2' and 'Toy Story 4': Release dates set
thread.title_full: 'Incredibles 2' and 'Toy Story 4': Release dates set - CNN.com

author: Lisa Respers France
title: 'Incredibles 2' and 'Toy Story 4': Release dates set
text:
Story highlights "The Incredibles" sequel coming 15 years after original "Toy Story 4" has been pushed back a year -- to 2018 (CNN) The good news is that "The Incredibles 2" is happening.
The bad news is we have to wait until 2019.
Disney announced release dates for some of its projects, and Variety put together a list. And while Pixar's "Cars 3" will be released in June 2017, fans eagerly anticipating "Toy Story 4" and "The Incredibles 2" will have a longer wait.
"Toy Story 4" has reportedly been moved back from June 2017 to June 2018, with "The Incredibles 2" set for June 2019.
You read that correctly: 2019.
Read More The animated sequel about a family of superheroes will be released 15 years after the original thrilled audiences. Some lamented on social media about the lag, with one person joking (we think) that he'll be "an old man" by then.
I have to wait until 2019 until #Incredibles2 I'll be an old man by then what is this cruel world
— Chris Parkes (@chris_parkes_) October 8, 2015 not tryna be rude but it's making me mad that Cars 3 is one of the Pixar movies i have to wait through to get to #ToyStory4 & #Incredibles2
— Will Ganss (@Will_Somers) October 9, 2015 I'll be 29 and a year closer to death when @DisneyPixar releases #Incredibles2
— Billy Saefong (@billybyte) October 9, 2015 Sorry guys, but at least we get a new "Star Wars" film in December, right?
